architectural_notes: Aplicativo utiliza múltiplas chaves de API; necessário padronizar onde são definidas/lidas (front e back-end) e como são selecionadas por ambiente/serviço.
known_issues: Nova aba 'monitor de fluxo de ordens' fica preta ~1s após abrir, aparentemente quando o front-end tenta se comunicar com o back-end (possível problema na integração/uso de chaves de API).

existing_features.title: Prevent the "Order Flow Monitor" UI from crashing (black screen) when Binance REST responses are missing/empty or when saved localStorage settings are malformed, by adding defensive parsing/guards and a user-visible error fallback instead of an unhandled React render error.

Audit and align frontend vs backend Binance API usage so the app does not mix inconsistent base domains/endpoints and clearly separates public (no key) vs private (key/secret) calls; ensure the frontend order-flow tab never requires Binance API keys to fetch public market data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Auditar integração de APIs no front-end e back-end (leitura/uso de múltiplas chaves de API) e corrigir inconsistências que causam falha na nova aba.

Fix backend Binance private API implementation inconsistencies: remove placeholder example positions and implement real fetching/parsing for open futures positions using the stored apiKey/apiSecret (including required signing if the endpoint requires it), returning normalized positions consistent with the frontend types.

projectName: Audit and fix API integration inconsistencies causing the Order Flow Monitor tab to go black
